lines.text: Hey Max, you heard the story of the scarecrow?
No.
You think crows are scared of a scarecrow?
Yeah, I think they're scared. Yeah why?
No, crows are not scared, believe me.
The god damn crows are scared.
No, crows are laughin'.
Nah, that's bullshit...
That's right, the crows are laughin'. Look, the farmer puts out a scarecrow, right, with a funny hat on it, got a funny face. The crows fly by, they see that, it strikes 'em funny, makes 'em laugh.
The god damn crows are laughin'?
That's right, they're laughin' their asses off. And then they say, "Well, that ol' farmer Jo down there, he's a pretty good guy. He made us laugh, so he won't bother him any more."
The god damn crows are laughin'...
Ohh, they laughin', woooo!
I gotta tell ya somethin', that's the most hare-brained idea I've ever heard.
It's true, they're laughin' their asses off.
The crows are laughin'... I guess the fish are reciting poetry...
I guess so.
Uh huh... and the uh, pigs are playin' banjo? And the dogs would be, let's see, uh... playin' hockey. And the uh... the uh...
Crows are laughin'.

Crows are laughin', right. Ya know, in the joint I've heard some tales, oh boy, golly I've heard some tall tales. But at least those guys had the decency to admit that it was bullshit, you know what I mean? They actually took pride, pride in that it was bullshit. But the crows are laughin' huh? I mean you're not playin' with a full deck man, you got one foot in the grave beyond.

[while introducing Lion to Coley]
Ah, Coley this is my associate,Lion.
It's nice to meet you Lion.
It's nice to meet you Coley, Max has told me nothing about you.
It'll be ladies' night every Monday night of the week! And we'll have... uh...
Lollipops!
LOLLIPOPS!

[to Max from her bar stool]
Shut the door, you big dope. You're lettin' all the smoke out!

[at the lunch counter]
Gimme a chocolate donut and a bottle of beer.
Scarecrows are beautiful.
For every car, there is dirt.
Hey Max, what do you do when it's cold?
I put on more clothes. I'm a cold-blooded bastard, I never get warm enough. I take a little nap after every fight.
What's with the shoe?
What's with mindin' your own business?
Boy, some partner I picked.
You didn't pick me, I picked you.
Why?
'Cause you gave me your last match. You made me laugh. God damn crows are laughin'...

[First lines]
Hi,how you doin'

[after car passes]
Up yours, you two-bit sonofabitch you!

[after another car passes]
Eat canteloupe, you bellyaching rhinoceros!
And what did you miss most in prison?

[Straight-faced to the sexy Frenchy]
Home cooking.
The crows are laughin'!

[Lion was beaten almost to death by Riley]
Oh my god,what happened?
Riley tried to fuck me, so I had to beat the shit out of him.
Guess what, I'm a "scarecrow"
Yeah Max,you're a "scarecrow". You're also an "asshole"
Hey!
You're also a "scarecrow".
A crow isn't afraid of a scarecrow. It laughs.
It's going to be ladies night every Monday night of the week!
I gotta' tell you something about me. I'm, like, the meanest son of a bitch alive, you know what I mean?
Yeah?
I don't trust anybody... I don't love anybody... And I can tear the ass out of a goddamned elephant, too!
Oh, I tell you, that Frenchy is 160 weight of mean woman! I tell ya', she did things I didn't think you could do less'n you were a snake!
Gotta' admire talent...
What's wrong with him?
Your friend has serious trouble.
Yeah, well, what...
He's catatonic.
How'd he catch that?
Well, it's nothing you "catch"...
Ahhh!
Feel better?
Yeah. I'm telling you... gettin' laid is sure good for my regularity.
Hey Max, I've been meaning to ask you...
Yeah?
In the joint...
Yeah?
No women, right?
No.
So how'd you get laid?

[gives Lion a long, piercing look before he says anything]
I'm gonna' have that car wash. Yeah! And a deep freezer full of steaks. And *ass,* buddy! I mean ASS!
Max, you should be more careful where you drop your drawers. Some scorpion will put a lip-lock on your big ass.
Uh-huh. Well, it'll be his funeral.

[to Max, as they're sitting in a bar]
High school graduation has its prom here every year. They even have "Pomp and Circumstances" on the jukebox.
